Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: Teacher being human can identify the issues in the week work themselves as they know context so makes it quick and easy to get the feedback. Whereas in Ai, a lot of background needs to be fed and also sometimes it doesn't give the response as required

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: Efforts required to complete the task I lesser when talking to teacher

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: Teacher is specific of what is being asked but ai gives to much information which is somewhat not really needed
